title: This husband shows the meaning of true love with a second proposal (5 Photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
If this doesn’t make you shed a tear or two then you should double check to see if your heart is still beating. 
Christin Koch is 18 years old and the daughter of this amazing couple. She said her mom was diagnosed with breast cancer in January and recently had surgery, she’s been recovering at home ever since. 2 
Her parents, Jim and Laura have been married for 26 years, but Jim wanted to do something extra special for his wife. He proposed to her for a second time to remind her he’s with her through the good and bad, in sickness and in health. 
Christin said her mom was so surprised and happy she started crying every time she looked at her new ring. Her new wedding ring still has the diamonds from her original band. 
After the proposal Christin’s mom said, “This is what true love really is, even when I look like this he still loves me. As unattractive as I feel right now I can’t believe I deserve something so beautiful.” 
Christin posted a few pictures of her parents on Twitter after the proposal and people loved it. 3
